Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section and contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393541) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393541)
